attributes.additional_details:
Is it not time that this bldy govt stopped messing about and sent help and arms to relieve the Syrian armed forces to help quell this civil war.

To much has been said by "Dave" about atrocities carried out by President Assads forces but no mention from 2Dave" about the atrocities carried out by the terrorists who have jumped on the bandwaggon.

Almost all the Christians in parts of Syria have been massacred by these freedom fighters.
